About.paragraph: We drive new clients to your store and compensate them to leave trustful reviews.
Why: Reach thousands of customers that live close to your store
Target customers based on their profile
Pay real clients to leave honest reviews
Why2: We verify that the reviews come from real customers
Customers only get paid after they leave their review

all.name: Drive new customers to your store
all.text: Komenteo sends special deals to customers from your area. Clients get paid after they published their reviews.

all.name: Reward Customers for leaving public reviews
all.text: Your customer receive a compensation after they left their review on your google page.

all.name: Target customers based on their profile
all.text: Offer special discounts to customers that are known to 'drink wine' or 'usually come in large group'.

all.name: Manage your only reputation
all.text: Use Komenteo AI tool to automate customer support. Get alerts based on sentiment analysis.

all.name: See user reviews in your own language
all.text: Komenteo can display user reviews in the language of your choice and translate your response back.
